name: Escape Bad (Itch.io Edition)
description:
Escape Bad is a scratch made rage game i made back in september of 2020. the whole point of it was to get the highest score. look out though, because there are special types of bads,  and they wont stop until you're dead.

controls

click the perks to use them, and  use the arrows to move.

b to close the achievement menu
